name: Mirror Doodle
description:
Made for Global Game Jam 2022 with the theme "DUALITY". The first game made in a Game Jam in 2022 by a group of three.

Mirror Doodle is a puzzle game where you control two characters and one must die in order to proceed to the next puzzle. 

CONTROLS:

WASD to Move the character
SPACEBAR to shoot a projectile 

DEVELOPERS:

Solareclipse: (https://suryanaren.itch.io/) : Design, Programming, SFX
Getem Ratan: (https://getemratan.itch.io/) : Design, Programming, UI, Music
MajorBacon: Design, Art

ADDITIONAL CREDIT
